data.title: Tun Hussein Onn
data.meta_description: Tun Hussein Onn - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Tun Hussein Onn was Malaysia's third prime minister, holding office from 1976 to 1981. He received an education in Singapore and Johor Bahru before joining the military and serving in World War II. After the war, he held positions in the civil service and police in Malaysia before entering politics with UMNO in 1949. Tun Hussein Onn resigned as prime minister in 1981 due to health issues but was renowned for his emphasis on national unity and policies addressing economic imbalances.
